oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fjern kvikudløbere og overvej kompostering
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melander, B.
Nørremark, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This article deals with aspects of destructing Elytrigia repens rhizomes after they have been uprooted and exposed on the soil surface. Removal from the field is the best practical option at present. Mechanical crushing may become possible in a few years time to erase their sprouting ability and with the prospects of reurning nutrients to the soil.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Melander, B. and Nørremark, M. (2010) Fjern kvikudløbere og overvej kompostering. Landbrugsavisen, 1 October 2010, p. 16.
